Description: Magical gem; intaglio; dark green jasper; engraved on side A; bevelled side C. Side A: Harpocrates sitting to right on lotus with knees drawn up; under the flower two stalks with buds. Baseline indicating primeval mound? Horus’ left hand raised to his mouth, his right holds a flail. He is wearing a headband (?) in his long hair; on the top of the head the double crown of Egypt. Side B: Inscribed in two lines. Side C: Inscibed.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (112)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
CBd / The Campbell Bonner Magical Gems Database Online (512) (http://classics.mfab.hu/talismans/cbd/512)
